name: lopy_node
description: Code for the lopy to send per Sensor Data per Lora and Wlan.
author: Karl Wolffgang <karl_eugen.wolffgang@tu-dresden.de>

scripts.minify: node_modules/.bin/html-minifier --input-dir www_unpacked --output-dir mc_code/www --file-ext html -c html_minify.json && node_modules/.bin/postcss www_unpacked/css/*.css --dir mc_code/www/css
